realms.description: The realm is in need of a stronger Threshold Network. Strengthen it by depositing and redeeming tBTC, and staking or LPing T!

quests.name: Stake T
quests.description: Stake at least **100 T** for at least **2 days**

quests.name: Operate T
quests.description: Stake at least **5000 T** with a running operator for at least **3 weeks**

quests.name: Mint tBTC
quests.description: Mint at least **0.1 BTC** into tBTC.

quests.name: Redeem tBTC
quests.description: Redeem at least **0.5 BTC** into tBTC.

quests.name: Mint and hold/use tBTC
quests.description: Mint at least **0.1 BTC** into tBTC and hold it or transfer it to known LP contracts.
